Name: Advanced Guard Module
Description: A module is a sophisticated technological device that adventurers can equip to enhance their abilities by linking to the module's power cores. This Advanced guard module is highly efficient, flexible in operation, and contains 2 power cores, making it popular among adventurers.
Description$english: A module is a sophisticated technological device that adventurers can equip to enhance their abilities by linking to the module's power cores. This Advanced guard module is highly efficient, flexible in operation, and contains 2 power cores, making it popular among adventurers.
